Translations.Text: gajang jabilousigo gajang jaaelousin hananim-ui ileum-eulo
modeun chanmineun man-yuui junim-isin hananim-ui geos-ila
gajang jabilousin bun-isimyeo gajang jaaelousin bun
jeohuineun dangsinman-eul gyeongbaehamyeo dangsinkkeman doum-eul yocheonghabnida
geu gil-eun dangsinkkeseo eunchong-eul bepusin jadeul-ui gilloseo, dangsin-ui noyeoum-eul san jadeul-ui gildo animyeo banghwanghaneun jadeul-ui gildo anibnida
